page.title: 18WALKING IN THE CALNE AREA
page.content: Sometimes my friends and I go walking up the lane. There is a house next to a field and in the field there are some stables and three horses. There are some pipes outside the field and we sometimes sit on them and watch the horses jumping over the barrels and fences.Opposite the house is another field with a horse and cows in it.Some sheep pass through now and again to get to the next field.The horse is a black stallion, and has to sleep outside the little hut as it is too mucky from the cows.There are holes in the hedges for sheep to get through. We watch the rabbits and enjoy the wild flowers.There are lots of elderberry bushes and hawthorns.We go blackberry picking in the autumn and my Dad picks the elderberry flowers and berries for making wine.
